ygData.subject: Dark Lavacons/Will Skulletron Make It Alive??

::Dark Lavacons::

        The Dark Lavacons immediately stop firing, when =
commanded by Starscream.  Then, they recieved a message from Zardus.

     =
     Astral turned to Starscream.

          "Hey, nice meeting you, but we=
 must leave, the path of destruction is ours to create!!!" Astral laughed d=
emonically, firing a missile from his dark flame rocket launcher, which hit=
 the ground in front of Starscream, and made a ring of dark fire around him=
, but not to hurt him. 

        They all said goodbye quickly and in an in=
stant got up and sped off towards the battle.
~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~=
~~~~~~~~~~~~~~
::Skulletron::

          Skulletron continues limping down =
a corridor, holding his bleeding side.  Two autoguns popped up and started =
blasting holes in his upper body, up to the chest.  He kept going back, mec=
h fluid was spurting everywhere with each blast.  Soon, he was bound to be =
found out.  He took out his raygun and just as h was going to press the tri=
gger, he put it back, rolling to dodge shots.  He didn't need his weaponfir=
e to be detected.  Suddenly, he felt something in him, a big boost of energ=
y.  Unintentionally, his body sprang into action.  Skulletron did a somersa=
ult forward, in between the two autoguns, and landed behind them.  He grabb=
ed them, and used force to turn them to face each other, then let go quickl=
y.  The two autoguns blasted eachother.  Skulletron gave a thumbs up to him=
self, and then fell down on the ground.  Mech fluid poured and poured.  Sku=
lletron knew it, he was going to die.  But, he wouldn't let himself go that=
 easily.  He fought death.  But, he didn't know how long he could fight it.=


       He opened his comlink to all Alliance members.

       "This is...=
..This is....." He spat out some mech fluid, "This is Skulletron........Ugh=
h.........." He yelled in pain as a spasm of pain hit him, "Rescue me......=
Release me from these.....These......." Skulletron coughed up more mech flu=
id, "Send somebody to get me.........Get me...........I'm...I...I....I'm...=
..I'm......I'm dieing.........Slowly dieing..........Need.....Help......" S=
kulletron's optics closed, and he was still alive, but in really bad shape.=
  His body just lay there in a massive pool of mechfluid, growing.
